<!-- source-hash: ea8048aa879bc085a45d5b6e238f9b66 -->
A Spring component that handles mapping between internal API DTOs and external REST API DTOs for audit log functionality, extending BaseRestMapper for common mapping operations.

## Key Components

- **toLogResponse()** - Converts `LogEvent` API DTO to `LogResponse` external DTO
- **toLogsResponse()** - Maps paginated query results containing multiple log events to external response format
- **toLogFilterResponse()** - Transforms `LogFilters` API DTO to external filter response with organizations
- **toLogFilterOptions()** - Converts external `LogFilterCriteria` to internal `LogFilterOptions` for filtering
- **toLogDetailsResponse()** - Maps detailed `LogDetails` API DTO to external detailed response format
- **toSortInput()** - Converts external `SortCriteria` to internal `SortInput` with direction mapping

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private LogMapper logMapper;

// Convert single log event for API response
LogEvent event = logService.getLogEvent(eventId);
LogResponse response = logMapper.toLogResponse(event);

// Map paginated log results
GenericQueryResult<LogEvent> queryResult = logService.getLogs(filters, pageInput);
LogsResponse logsResponse = logMapper.toLogsResponse(queryResult);

// Transform filter criteria from REST to internal format
LogFilterCriteria criteria = new LogFilterCriteria();
criteria.setStartDate(LocalDate.now().minusDays(7));
criteria.setSeverities(List.of("ERROR", "WARN"));
LogFilterOptions options = logMapper.toLogFilterOptions(criteria);

// Convert sorting parameters
SortCriteria sortCriteria = new SortCriteria("timestamp", "DESC");
SortInput sortInput = logMapper.toSortInput(sortCriteria);
```
